item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[center][b][quote=“kbpapango, post:4, topic:541169”]i alredy bought a vps

4 vCPUs
1GB Memory
40GB Disk
4TB Transfe

by vexxhost.

done login in putty and winscp
then i transfer my source to the vps root folder, whats next to do?[/quote]

(you dont need to portforward a vps there automatic) only needs a no-ip setup

no idea what your doing
a vps is the same as a computer put the source and client on the desktop
download duc and setup the no-ip go onto the duc program and click to the no-ip address until its active and running (tick box)
then added the no-ip address to your client folder. dont forget to download jdk and java on the vps
change the jdk within the cmd of the source so the run works then click run (if you did change the ip address in the client then compile)

this should work fine and very easy my skype is haviland41

to connect to the vps go onto remote desktop connection should be all ready installed on your main computer
type that into the start button then your address number they give you and then the password - username is set to administrator.

to get players to go onto your server then download jarmaker and folow a tut from youtube on how to create a .jar client
then give this to your players on put this onto your website and the webclient can be done with the jarmaker aswell for the html link
for the website aswell.

hope i could help you mate ;D[/b][/center]

Read full topic
